description: [NotPetya](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0368) uses wevtutil to clear the Windows event logs.(Citation: Talos Nyetya June 2017)(Citation: US District Court Indictment GRU Unit 74455 October 2020)

external_references.description: Chiu, A. (2016, June 27). New Ransomware Variant "Nyetya" Compromises Systems Worldwide. Retrieved March 26, 2019.

external_references.source_name: US District Court Indictment GRU Unit 74455 October 2020
